metrics_conclusion: In the Afternoon has higher complexity than the average song  in terms Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: In the Afternoon has sections analyzed in the following keys: A♯ Phrygian,  and F♯ Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!

metadata.editComments: Fixed a note in the fifth measure
Changed view from Phrygian to Ionian. The introduction of the F# ( I ) in the chorus definitely shifts tonality to a regular F# Major progression.
